assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Bhansali Engineering Polymers Limited operates as an integrated petrochemical company in India and internationally. It manufactures and sells acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and styrene acrylonitrile (SAN) resins, as well as high rubber graft. The company's products include general, heat resistant, flame retardant, transparent, and extrusion ABS; and ABS-polycarbonate alloys, glass reinforced ABS, PMMA-ABS, and PVC modifiers. Its ABS resins are used as a raw material for companies dealing in automobiles, home appliances, telecommunications, luggage, bus body, and other applications. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
